thread.title: Consumer Reports: Save money with energy-preserving efforts
thread.title_full: Consumer Reports: Save money with energy-preserving efforts - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Consumer Reports: Save money with energy-preserving efforts
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - Ever wonder where all of your energy dollars go? Knowing where your home's biggest energy hogs are can help you focus your efficiency efforts. Consumer Reports has identified some of the biggest home energy hogs and ways we can cut the cost of running them without sacrificing comfort. Senior Editor, Dan DiClerico, spoke with us on how to save.
Watch the video for more information.
